title: 2015 Veikkausliiga
text:
The 2015 <a href="Veikkausliiga">Veikkausliiga</a> was the eighty-fifth season of top-tier <a href="Association%20football">football</a> in <a href="Finland">Finland</a>. <a href="Helsingin%20Jalkapalloklubi">HJK Helsinki</a> were the defending champions. The season was won by <a href="Sein%C3%A4joen%20Jalkapallokerho">SJK</a>, ending HJK's record streak of six straight titles.
Teams.
<a href="Turun%20Palloseura">TPS</a> were relegated to <a href="Ykk%C3%B6nen">Ykkönen</a> after finishing at the bottom of the <a href="2014%20Veikkausliiga">2014 season</a>. Their place was taken by <a href="2014%20Ykk%C3%B6nen">Ykkönen</a> champions <a href="HIFK%20Fotboll">HIFK</a>.
<a href="FC%20Honka">FC Honka</a> and <a href="MYPA">MYPA</a> were not given a license due to the clubs' bad economic situation. The two places were given for <a href="FC%20KTP">KTP</a>, the runner-up of 2014 <a href="Ykk%C3%B6nen">Ykkönen</a>, and <a href="FC%20Ilves">Ilves</a>, which finished third in Ykkönen.
